name: Marta's Mantra
description:
Marta, a young ballerina, steps onstage for her first big audition. But her self-doubt threatens to spiral her out of control. Dive into Marta's psyche and race your way through through scary clouds, evil eyes, distracting donuts, and more in order to help this aspiring dancer achieve her dream. Stick to the path...or don't. What does being 'in control' really mean?  

An immersive interactive fiction experience created by J.D. Pennock and Joss Areté Kelvin, with music by Christopher Dammann.
